reviewtext: It took about 4 reboots for it to finaly work - which I shouldn't have to do with a USB device.  I've put in USB scanners and such with less work.  Still - I'm happy with it.  Works great.  I went from a trackball marble to  this IntelliMouse - I'm not yet sure which I like better, but I think it  will work better for games and photoshop. :)
summary: Once it's working - It works great
